channel.title: Comments on: What would persuade you…

item.title: By: Wild Bill
item.dc:creator: Wild Bill
item.description: <p>Not a lot really. C# being a bastardised C and Java collision, only really supported by MS. So far.<br/><br /><br/><br />(Remember J++ ? )<br/><br /><br/><br />Okay, it allows you to hack low-level Active Directory objects.. Ah. More lock-in.<br/><br /><br/><br />Naa. I'll stick to Lotusscript (cos I can pay the mortgage), C++ when I need down+dirty and Java for multi-platform support...<br/><br /><br/><br />---* Bill</p>
item.content:encoded:
Not a lot really. C# being a bastardised C and Java collision, only really supported by MS. So far.

(Remember J++ ? )

Okay, it allows you to hack low-level Active Directory objects.. Ah. More lock-in.

Naa. I’ll stick to Lotusscript (cos I can pay the mortgage), C++ when I need down+dirty and Java for multi-platform support…

—* Bill
